thread.title: Judge in Abilify MDL allows additional depositions just weeks before first trial

author: Tina Bellon
title: Judge in Abilify MDL allows additional depositions just weeks before first trial
text:
A federal magistrate judge is allowing plaintiffs suing the makers of antipsychotic drug Abilify to take additional depositions based on newly disclosed company audit reports.
The order on Thursday by U.S. Magistrate Judge Gary Jones in Gainesville, Florida comes just weeks before the start of the first test trial in the multidistrict litigation in June.
To read the full story on WestlawNext Practitioner Insights, click here: bit.ly/2HElVdX
